readable.title: 2917057791_3d68a055ca
readable.content: A boy chases after a bird on a pier . A boy in a yellow shirt is looking at a bird on a wooden boardwalk A little boy in a bright yellow shirt and blue jeans is looking at a pigeon . A little dark-skinned boy in a yellow , number 21 jersey sees a pigeon . A young boy runs along a boardwalk towards a pigeon .
